https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vBQxx1Egjkdo8ofFnBQa5ekmFJO.jpg Arcade Fire are masters of epic performances and this date at the AccorsHotel arena was just that; as part of a major tour following the release of the Canadian sextet’s last album ‘Everything Now’. Arcade Fire - AccorHotels Arena
